channel.title: Blackmesa xp skin
channel.description:
I just had the idea of making a Blackmesa themed xp skin, so I dled skin edit to give it a shot and quickly discovered I have no idea what I am doing. I was wondering if someone more experienced in such things could make the theme.
So far what I have imagined is the rock texture from the main page of blackmesa be the title bar and task bar and perhaps a black and smaller version of this be the start menu icon. [img]https://s3-llnw-screenshots.wegame.com/8924490336556178/8924490336556178_l.png[/img]
I know it would be a lot of work to make this, but I think the result would look great.

item.title: Blackmesa xp skin
item.dc:creator: garrthbarrttinn
item.description:
Collision:

If you want to skin XP, the easiest way to learn is to visit https://www.stardock.com.

Sorry, I put skin edit when I meant to say skin studio, which is Stardock.
I probably could learn that, and I tried, but the result would look like shit so I am not even going to bother.

Read full topic

item.title: Blackmesa xp skin
item.dc:creator: Kaze
item.description:
I have no clue what “Skin edit” is but I’m guessing it’s one of those shit freeware tools that give you a false sense of productivity and achievement.

The case is likely this:

“Skin Edit” is to actually designing your own theme from scratch as RPG Maker is to Hammer.

Read full topic

item.title: Blackmesa xp skin
item.dc:creator: garrthbarrttinn
item.description:
The Minotaur:

That shape would work for a Vista skin, but as an xp start bar it wouldn’t be very good because it wouldn’t fit correctly in the button.

But I do agree that a windows skin atleast of Black Mesa would be awesome if someone were to make it.

using skin edit you can shape the start button to a certain extent I think. I know you can at least make the start button a circle.

Read full topic

item.title: Blackmesa xp skin

item.description:
I just had the idea of making a Blackmesa themed xp skin, so I dled skin edit to give it a shot and quickly discovered I have no idea what I am doing. I was wondering if someone more experienced in such things could make the theme.

So far what I have imagined is the rock texture from the main page of blackmesa be the title bar and task bar and perhaps a black and smaller version of this be the start menu icon.

I know it would be a lot of work to make this, but I think the result would look great.
